query:
SELECT 
  COUNT(*) as total_lojas,
  SUM(totalServicos) as soma_servicos,
  AVG(taxaReparacao) as media_taxa_reparacao,
  AVG(desvioPercentualMes) as media_desvio
FROM resultados_mensais 
WHERE mes = 12 AND ano = 2025;

  AVG(taxaReparacao) as media_taxa_reparacao,
